sentences.sContent: He hurried across the stream and reached a meadow. He stopped and looked around, as if hewere looking for something.
sentences.sContent_eng: He hurried across the stream and reached a meadow. He stopped and looked around, as if hewere looking for something.
sentences.sCn: 忽然来了一个人，他匆匆地穿过溪流，来到草地上，停下来四处看了看，好像在寻找什么。 。

sentences.sContent: They also showed me in another place what they thought was a "leach-hole, " through which the pond leaked out under a hill into a neighboring meadow, pushing me out on a cake of ice to see it.
sentences.sContent_eng: They also showed me in another place what they thought was a "leach-hole, " through which the pond leaked out under a hill into a neighboring meadow, pushing me out on a cake of ice to see it.
sentences.sCn: 另外一个地方他们还指给我看过，他们认为那是一个“漏洞”，湖水从那里漏出去，从一座小山下经过，到达邻近的一处草地，他们让我待在一个冰块上把我推过去看。

remMethod.val: mea(看作meal， 美餐) ＋ dow → 牛、 羊美餐的地方 → 草地， 牧场

trans.tranOther: a field with wild grass and flowers
